definitions.definition: to look at something or someone carefully in order to discover information, especially about their quality or condition:
examples: After the crash both drivers got out and inspected their cars for damage.

definitions.definition: to officially visit a place or a group of people in order to check that everything is correct and legal:
examples: An official from the Department of Health will be inspecting the restaurant this afternoon.

definitions.definition: If a building is inspected, it is examined carefully by a specially trained person, in order to discover if there is anything wrong with its structure.
